original: Testimonials
translated: 客户评价

original: Case Study
translated: 参考案例

original: Read a call center phone transcript.
translated: 阅读一份来自全球呼叫中心的通话记录。

original: Business across continents
translated: 大型跨国企业

original: A conversation with the CEO of
translated: 与CEO的一次对话——

original: Fruit
translated: 水果公司

original: Outsource For America helped Doug Hatchet, CEO of
translated: 外包美国劳动帮助了

original: FRUIT Computers
translated: 水果电脑公司

original: , to offshore 2,500 US employees at the beginning of the year. Doug, now the only person left at FRUIT's six-story corporate headquarters said, "I would like to thank OFA for such a smooth transition. As I sit in the empty cafeteria each day, I smile as I think of all the 401Ks and HMOs that I have put through the shredder. My take-home is octupling by the week and I plan to retire within a couple of months. I still see some of my old computer systems analysts at the Burger Shot drive-thru but I don't go there as often now; the milkshakes have gotten a bit salty."
translated: 的CEO，Doug Hatchet，成功在年初将2,500个原先设在美国的岗位转移到了海外。Doug现在是水果公司总部内的唯一一个人，他说：「感谢外包美国劳动为我提供了如此平滑的过渡。每天坐在空荡的食堂里，我面带微笑地想着自己省下来的养老金和医保。到手工资一周翻了八倍，我已经决定在几个月后退休了。虽然有在吃得饱汉堡的路边窗口看见过以前手下的电脑系统分析员，但我现在不怎么去那儿了，他们的奶昔有点咸了。」

original: A smooth transition.
translated: 平滑的过渡。

original: Mr. Hatchet has already established a close relationship with his overseas team. Below is a transcript from a recent phone conversation:
translated: Hatchet先生已和他的海外团队建立起紧密的联系。以下是来自最近一则电话的通话记录：

original: Amir: A very good morning to you, Sir. Welcome to WOLFS INTERNATIONAL REALTY. You are connected to Mr. George Washington, how can I facilitate the purchase of your dream home?
translated: Amir：新的一天早上好，先生。感谢您联系WOLFS国际房产。乔治华盛顿正在为您服务，请问您在购买梦想之家的过程中有什么需要帮忙吗？

original: Doug: Hi George. It's Doug over at FRUIT Computers. Why did you take so long to answer the phone?
translated: Doug：你好，乔治。我是水果公司的Doug。你接电话怎么这么慢？

original: Amir: I'm apologizing for the delay, Doug. I had to finish off a triple-heart bypass.
translated: Amir：稍有拖慢，非常抱歉，Doug。刚才我在做心脏三联旁路手术。

original: Doug: Is that an English accent?
translated: Doug：你这是英国口音吗？

original: Amir: Yes.
translated: Amir：是的。

original: Doug: It's pretty good.
translated: Doug：真是太棒了。

original: Amir: Thanks. Have you tried re-booting?
translated: Amir：谢谢。您有尝试过重新启动吗？

original: Doug: What are you talking about, George?
translated: Doug：你在说什么，乔治？

original: Amir: Sorry, I'm a little tired, Doug. It's 4am over here and I've been working for three days straight.
translated: Amir：抱歉，我有点累了，Doug。现在我这里是凌晨四点，而且我已经连续工作了三天了。

original: Doug: Can you order me some lunch, George? And please get it right this time. When I ordered a slice of Margarita and a shake last week, an Arab gentleman arrived at the door with a tequila cocktail.
translated: Doug：你能帮我点一份午餐吗，乔治？希望这次不要出错。上周我点了玛格丽特和奶昔，结果那位阿拉伯绅士送来的是龙舌兰鸡尾酒。

original: Amir: Do not concern yourself. I am very close to completing my cultural acclimatization course. Just the 'disintegration of the family unit' module to go.
translated: Amir：请不要担心。我的文化适应训练即将完成，只剩最后的「解构家庭单元」模块了。

original: Doug: George? George, are you still there?
translated: Doug：乔治？乔治？你还在吗？

original: Amir: Good afternoon. Chiropractor Overnight - the power to paralyze in 24 hours! You're speaking to George Washington...
translated: Amir：下午好。推拿一夜通，24小时内麻痹全身！乔治华盛顿正在为您服务...

original: Doug: What happened, George? Did you hang up on me?!
translated: Doug：怎么回事，乔治？你把我挂掉了吗？！

original: Amir: Sincere apologies, Mr. Doug. Tuna taco and my eyes are on fire. Shit, the lights went out. Our national power grid is a little erratic.
translated: Amir：非常抱歉，Doug先生。金枪鱼卷饼和我的眼睛着火了。妈的，灯灭了。我们国家的电网不太靠谱。

original: Doug: Whatever Habid.
translated: Doug：好吧，哈比德。

original: Amir: It's George.
translated: Amir：我是乔治。

original: Doug: Everything's falling apart over here, George. I've run out of all supplies... I haven't even got a stapler.
translated: Doug：现在情况非常糟糕啊，乔治。我已经弹尽粮绝了... 连订书机都没了。

original: Amir: Regrettably, George cannot assist in that matter. I must inform you that all administrative functions have been outsourced to our service partner in Africa.
translated: Amir：很遗憾，乔治无法在这方面帮助您。您需要知道，所有的行政职能都已外包给了我们在非洲的合作伙伴。

original: Doug: Are you kidding me, George? What about all the stuff that I ordered last week?
translated: Doug：开什么玩笑，乔治？那我上周订的东西呢？

original: Amir: I am just editing a sitcom. Can I help you with anything else today? I have 36 people on hold, some from companies who pay us much more than FRUIT.
translated: Amir：刚才在剪情景剧。今天有什么我能帮您的吗？后面还有36人等待，有些公司付的服务费比水果公司更多。

original: Doug: To be honest, George, I am losing my mind over here. Can we not just talk for a while? Tell me more about hot foreign women.
translated: Doug：说实话，乔治，我要疯了。要么我们随便聊聊？跟我讲讲性感的外国女性吧。

original: Amir: Certainly, Sir. I am trained in building empathy with the customer. Did you see the game last night? They really slam-dunked a home run! And wow, women really hate going down on me. Yes, do I sound American?
translated: Amir：好的，先生。我接受过训练，锻炼了与客户共情的能力。您看过昨晚的比赛吗？那一记本垒打太漂亮了！而且啊，哇，女人真的 很讨厌我。好了，我听起来像美国人吗？

original: Doug: Yeah, I guess. You ever get so lonely you talk to poor people? I'm doing that now. Sometimes I feel so lonely. This building is like a ghost town and I've become a social pariah in the local community. Everyone is boycotting my products. Are you happy, George?
translated: Doug：还行吧。你有没有太过寂寞，想找穷人聊天的时候？我现在就是这样。有时我会感到寂寞。整栋办公楼就像一座鬼城，我成了唯一一个被抛弃的人。所有人都在抵制我的产品。你听了开心吗，乔治？

original: Doug: George?
translated: Doug：乔治？

original: Amir: That question is not covered on any of my scripts. Have you considered a package deal? We have some excellent offers on rental cars?
translated: Amir：我所有的应答手册中都没有涉及这一问题。有考虑过购买套餐吗？我们在租车旅行这方面有很好的优惠哦？

original: Doug: This is hopeless. Why are you trying to sell me a vacation?
translated: Doug：无药可救了。你跟我推销旅游干嘛？

original: Amir: Hello Doug. Please remove the sim card from the back of the cell phone.
translated: Amir：您好，Doug。请打开手机后盖，取出SIM卡。

original: Doug: This is ridiculous, George. You're supposed to be my outsourced personal assistant.
translated: Doug：太荒谬了，乔治。你可是我的外包私人助理啊。

original: Amir: Today I am also your accountant, personal trainer and HR director.
translated: Amir：今天我也是您的会计、私人教练兼人事主管。

original: Doug: It's simply not good enough. I'm sitting over here with nothing but the photocopier for company and even that doesn't work!
translated: Doug：这样还不够。我现在坐在办公室里，手边只有一台公司的复印机，而且还是坏的！

original: Amir: I currently support 27 companies at Outsource For America so you are actually receiving far better customer service than you realize. Can I help you with anything else today?
translated: Amir：我正在为来自外包美国劳动的27家公司服务，您现在获得的服务已经远远优于其他公司了。还有什么能够帮到您的吗？

original: Doug: That's all for now, George. Can I call you tonight?
translated: Doug：没别的事了，乔治。今晚再联系可以吗？

original: Amir: I'm leaving in 10 minutes to pick up my new SUV.
translated: Amir：再过十分钟我就要去提我的新SUV了。

original: Doug: OK. Forget it. Bye George.
translated: Doug：好吧，那算了。再见，乔治。

original: Amir: Peace out.
translated: Amir：再见。
